verses.verse: In the year <S%H8141><s%> that king <S%H4428><s%> Uzziah <S%H5818><s%> died, <S%H4194><s%> I saw <S%H7200><s%> the <S%H853><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%> sitting <S%H3427><s%> on a throne, <S%H3678><s%> high <S%H7311><s%> and lifted up; <S%H5375><s%> and his train <S%H7757><s%> filled <S%H4392><s%> the temple. <S%H1964><s%>

Above <S%H4605><s%> him stood <S%H5975><s%> the seraphim. <S%H8314><s%> Each <S%H259><s%> one had six <S%H8337><s%> wings. <S%H3671><s%> With two <S%H8147><s%> he covered <S%H3680><s%> his face. <S%H6440><s%> With two <S%H8147><s%> he covered <S%H3680><s%> his feet. <S%H7272><s%> With two <S%H8147><s%> he flew. <S%H5774><s%>

One called <S%H7121><s%> to another, <S%H559><s%> and said, "Holy, <S%H6918><s%> holy, <S%H6918><s%> holy, <S%H6918><s%> is Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies! <S%H6635><s%> The whole earth <S%H776><s%> is full <S%H4393><s%> of his glory! <S%H3519><s%>"

The foundations <S%H520><s%> of the thresholds <S%H5592><s%> shook <S%H5128><s%> at the voice <S%H6963><s%> of him who called, <S%H7121><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> was filled <S%H4390><s%> with smoke. <S%H6227><s%>

Then I said, <S%H559><s%> "Woe <S%H188><s%> is me! <S%H1820><s%> For I am undone, because I am a man <S%H376><s%> of unclean <S%H2931><s%> lips, <S%H8193><s%> and I dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of a people <S%H5971><s%> of unclean <S%H2931><s%> lips: <S%H8193><s%> for my eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> the King, <S%H4428><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies! <S%H6635><s%>"

Then one <S%H259><s%> of the seraphim <S%H8314><s%> flew <S%H5774><s%> to me, <S%H7531><s%> having a live coal in his hand, <S%H3027><s%> which he had taken <S%H3947><s%> with the tongs <S%H4457><s%> from off the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

He touched <S%H5060><s%> my mouth <S%H6310><s%> with it, <S%H559><s%> and said, "Behold, <S%H5060><s%> this has touched your lips; <S%H8193><s%> and your iniquity <S%H5771><s%> is taken away, <S%H5493><s%> and your sin <S%H2403><s%> forgiven. <S%H3722><s%>"

I heard <S%H8085><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%>'s voice, <S%H6963><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Whom shall I send, <S%H7971><s%> and who will go <S%H3212><s%> for us? <S%H559><s%>" Then I said, "Here I am. <S%H7971><s%> Send me!"

He said, <S%H559><s%> "Go, <S%H3212><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> this people, <S%H5971><s%> <S%H8085><s%> 'You hear indeed, <S%H8085><s%> but don't <S%H995><s%> understand; and you see <S%H7200><s%> indeed, <S%H7200><s%> but don't <S%H3045><s%> perceive.'

Make the heart <S%H3820><s%> of this people <S%H5971><s%> fat. <S%H8080><s%> Make their ears <S%H241><s%> heavy, <S%H3513><s%> and shut <S%H8173><s%> their eyes; <S%H5869><s%> lest they see <S%H7200><s%> with their eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> with their ears, <S%H241><s%> and understand <S%H995><s%> with their heart, <S%H3824><s%> and turn <S%H7725><s%> again, <S%H7495><s%> and be healed."

Then I said, <S%H559><s%> "Lord, <S%H136><s%> how long? <S%H559><s%>" He answered, "Until cities <S%H5892><s%> are waste <S%H7582><s%> without inhabitant, <S%H3427><s%> and houses <S%H1004><s%> without man, <S%H120><s%> and the land <S%H127><s%> becomes utterly <S%H8077><s%> waste, <S%H7582><s%>

And Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has removed <S%H7368><s%> men <S%H120><s%> far away, <S%H7368><s%> and the forsaken <S%H5805><s%> places are many <S%H7227><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

If there is a tenth <S%H6224><s%> left in it, <S%H7725><s%> that also will in turn be consumed: <S%H1197><s%> as a terebinth, <S%H424><s%> and as an oak, <S%H437><s%> whose stock <S%H4678><s%> remains when they are felled; <S%H7995><s%> so the holy <S%H6944><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> is its stock. <S%H4678><s%>"
